definitions.definition: Any of many other (but not all) species in the genus Rubus .
The juicy aggregate fruit of these plants.
A red colour , the colour of a ripe raspberry.

secondary_definitions: Any of many other (but not all) species in the genus Rubus .
The juicy aggregate fruit of these plants.
A red colour , the colour of a ripe raspberry.

definitions.definition: A noise intended to imitate the passing of flatulence , made by blowing air out of the mouth while the tongue is protruding from and pressed against the lips, or by blowing air through the lips while they are pressed firmly together or against skin (often a form of tickling ) used humorously or to express derision.

main_definition: ( colloquial ) A noise intended to imitate the passing of flatulence , made by blowing air out of the mouth while the tongue is protruding from and pressed against the lips, or by blowing air through the lips while they are pressed firmly together or against skin (often a form of tickling ) used humorously or to express derision.
secondary_definitions: ( derogatory , colloquial ) A physically disabled person.
